column3: I don't think we want to change this. I've been happy that it was UTC time several times and I don't believe I've ever regretted it.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/34b4eccdc37ababec3b9fc7333a4d33c42d17a05 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
@gmaxwell, I think I've come to that conclusion too. UTC is nicer. I'll ask the owner of #3872 to close their issue.\n
